name: caydock-hugo
description: CayDock Hugo site - Personal project showcase website

scripts.build:music-cover: cd tools/music-cover && npm install && npm run build
scripts.dev: npm run clean:tools && npm run build:tools && hugo server -D --noHTTPCache --disableFastRender
scripts.dev:preview: npm run clean:tools && npm run build:tools && hugo server -D --baseURL / --noHTTPCache --disableFastRender
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean && npm run clean:tools
scripts.new:post: node -e "const name = process.argv[1] || 'new-post'; const date = new Date().toISOString().split('T')[0]; console.log('hugo new posts/' + date + '-' + name + '.md'); require('child_process').execSync('hugo new posts/' + date + '-' + name + '.md', {stdio: 'inherit'});"

author: Cayden
